00005 template <class X> DMatrix<X>::DMatrix(int n, int m) {
00006     assert(n>=1);
00007     assert(m>=1);
00008 /*  if (n<1) n=1;
00009     if (m<1) m=1;*/
00010     nrows=n;
00011     ncols=m;
00012     elems=new X[nrows*ncols];
00013     mrows=new X* [nrows];
00014     for (int i=0;i<nrows;i++) mrows[i]=elems+ncols*i;
00015 //  for (int i=0;i<nrows*ncols;i++) elems[i]=init;
00016     shares=new int;
00017     (*shares)=1;
00018 }
00019 
00020 template <class X> DMatrix<X>::DMatrix(const DMatrix& m) {
00021     shares=m.shares;
00022     elems=m.elems;
00023     nrows=m.nrows;
00024     ncols=m.ncols;
00025     mrows=m.mrows;
00026     (*shares)++;
00027 }
00028 template <class X> DMatrix<X>::~DMatrix() {
00029     if (--(*shares)) return;
00030     delete [] elems;
00031     delete [] mrows;
00032     delete shares;
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 template <class X> DMatrix<X>& DMatrix<X>::operator=(const DMatrix& m) {
00037     if (!--(*shares)) {
00038         delete [] elems;
00039         delete [] mrows;
00040         delete shares;
00041     }
00042     shares=m.shares;
00043     elems=m.elems;
00044     nrows=m.nrows;
00045     ncols=m.ncols;
00046     mrows=m.mrows;
00047     (*shares)++;
00048     return *this;
00049 }

00051 
00052 template <class X> void DMatrix<X>::detach() {
00053     DMatrix<X> aux(nrows,ncols);
00054     for (int i=0;i<nrows*ncols;i++) aux.elems[i]=elems[i];
00055     operator=(aux);
00056 }

00061 template <class X> 
00062 X DMatrix<X>::at(int i, int j, X zero) const {
00063     return isInside(i,j) ? mrows[i][j] : zero;
00064 }
00065 
00066 template <class X> 
00067 X& DMatrix<X>::el(int i, int j) throw(std::invalid_argument) {
00068     if( isInside(i,j) )
00069         return mrows[i][j];
00070     throw std::invalid_argument("DMatrix::el(): out of bounds"); // XXX sputare stringa
00071 }
00072 
00073 template <class X> 
00074 const X& DMatrix<X>::el(int i, int j) const throw(std::invalid_argument) {
00075     if( isInside(i,j) )
00076         return mrows[i][j];
00077     throw std::invalid_argument("DMatrix::el(): out of bounds"); // XXX sputare stringa
00078 }

00080 
00081 template <class X> 
00082 DMatrix<X> DMatrix<X>::aPieceOfYou(int i, int j, int m, int n, X zero) const {
00083     DMatrix<X> result(m,n);
00084     for(int u=0;u<m;u++)
00085         for(int v=0;v<n;v++)
00086             result[u][v] = at(i+u,j+v,zero);
00087     
00088     return result;  
00089 }
00090 
00091 template <class X> 
00092 DMatrix<X> DMatrix<X>::around(int i, int j, int m, X zero) const {
00093     return aPieceOfYou(i-m,j-m,2*m+1,2*m+1,zero);
00094 }

00096 
00097 template <class X> 
00098 bool DMatrix<X>::isInside(int i, int j) const {
00099     return i>=0 && j>=0 && i<nrows && j<ncols;
00100 }
00101 
00102 template <class X> 
00103 void DMatrix<X>::setAll(const X& x) {
00104     willModify();
00105     for (int i=0;i<nrows;i++)
00106         for (int j=0;j<ncols;j++)
00107             (*this)[i][j]=x;
00108 }
00109 
00110 template<class X>
00111 std::string DMatrix<X>::outputSpaceSeparated() const {
00112     std::ostringstream oss;
00113     oss << "   ";
00114     for(int i=0; i<nrows;i++)
00115         for(int j=0; j<ncols;j++)
00116             oss << at(i, j) << " ";
00117     oss << "   ";
00118     return oss.str();
00119 }

00121 
00122 template <class X> std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const DMatrix<X> &m) {
00123     os << "{";
00124     for (int i=0;i<m.rows();i++) {
00125         if (i>0) os << ",";
00126         os << "{";
00127         for (int j=0;j<m.columns();j++) {
00128             if (j>0) os << ",";
00129             os << m[i][j];
00130         }
00131         os << "}";
00132     }
00133     return os << "}";
00134 }
